column2: depression_suicidal <- depression %>% group_by(Gender, Have.you.ever.had.suicidal.thoughts.., Depression) %>% summarise(count=n())
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'Gender', 'Have.you.ever.had.suicidal.thoughts..'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
ggplot(depression_suicidal, aes(x = Have.you.ever.had.suicidal.thoughts.., y = count, fill = Gender)) +
title = "Does the Student have Suicidal Thoughts? and Whether or not they are Depressed.",
